definition: disgrace/dishonor/to insult/to bring disgrace or humiliation to/to be indebted to/self-deprecating/Taiwan pr. [ru4]
(of friends or partners) to share both the honor and the disgrace (idiom)

precepts regarding what is honorable and what is shameful (in particular, refers to the Socialist Concepts on Honors and Disgraces, PRC official moral principles promulgated from 2006)/abbr. for 社會主義榮辱觀|社会主义荣辱观/also known as the Eight Honors and Eight Shames 八榮八恥|八荣八耻[Ba1 Rong2 Ba1 Chi3]

sentences.english: There is stronger sense of responsibility, with society honor versus dishonor view.
sentences.chinese: 有較強的責任感，和社會榮辱觀。

sentences.english: Second, the literati painters regardless of the pros and cons of honor, always obsessed with painting.
sentences.chinese: 其二，文人畫家不管榮辱得失，始終癡迷於繪事。

sentences.english: What Americans do at times of tragedy is to come together and support each other.
sentences.chinese: 風雨同舟，榮辱與共是美國人民面對不幸的傳統美德。

sentences.english: In implementing the socialist outlook on honor-dishonor, we must catch on the key points.
sentences.chinese: 落實社會主義榮辱觀應當把握住關鍵。

sentences.english: To have balance in our lives, gives us a realistic view of the ups and downs of life.
sentences.chinese: 要擁有平衡，就得對生活中的榮辱起伏保持平常心。

sentences.english: Beijing has clearly thrown in its lot with the Kim dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 北京方面顯然已決定與金氏王朝榮辱與共。

sentences.english: Encourage your associates to hold a stake in the company.
sentences.chinese: 鼓勵你的同事們與公司榮辱與共，休慼相關。

sentences.english: We are part of China. Our futures are forever linked.
sentences.chinese: 香港是中國一部分，血脈相連，榮辱與共。

sentences.english: Over the history of its existence the Russian merchant fleet has seen the moments of boom and decline.
sentences.chinese: 在俄羅斯的歷史上，商船隊可謂是歷盡榮辱。

sentences.english: His view of shame is of great value for the construction of the contemporary concepts of honor and disgrace.
sentences.chinese: 顧炎武的“恥德”觀對當代榮辱觀建設具有啓示意義。

sentences.english: Fourth, the socialist concept of honor is the ideological and political education foundation.
sentences.chinese: 四是社會主義榮辱觀是大學生思想政治教育的基礎。

sentences.english: In this country, we share weal and woe .
sentences.chinese: 在這個國家，我們榮辱與共。

sentences.english: Mencius is rich in outlook on what are honor and dishonors.
sentences.chinese: 《孟子》中的榮辱觀豐富而深刻。

sentences.english: The knowledge and action is the key to educating on people's concept of honors and disgraces.
sentences.chinese: “知”與“行”是公民榮辱觀教育的關鍵環節。

sentences.english: And experienced the success, loss, honour or disgrace.
sentences.chinese: 經歷過成功失敗與榮辱。

sentences.english: Today the topic that I make a speech is" our honor versus dishonor in the heart view".
sentences.chinese: 今天我演講的題目是“我們心中的榮辱觀”。

definition: noble and lowly/high versus low social hierarchy of ruler to people, father to son, husband to wife in Confucianism
the ways of the world/social behavior
joys and sorrows/partings and reunions/the vicissitudes of life
prosperity and decline (of a kingdom)/rise and fall
to appraise/to pass judgment on/to speak ill of/praise and censure/appraisal
